data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Luton with the kick-off.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Wycombe kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Harry Cornick (Luton) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Ruddock Pelly gives Luton a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced David Wheeler with Fred Onyedinma. This is the first substitution made today by Gareth Ainsworth.
Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Kenilworth Road with Scott Kashket replacing Alex Samuel.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a third substitution, with Josh Parker replacing Daryl Horgan.
In the minute 73, Luton make their first substitution with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Jordan Clark.
Elliott Lee is replacing Harry Cornick for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
Danny Hylton is replacing James Collins for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
In the minute 89, Luton take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Elliott Lee.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
